ing: 1 tablespoon minced garlic, or to taste
des: "This is fantastic for marinating chicken, pork, or beef! My friend from Thailand gave me this recipe! I find most of my ingredients at an Oriental market. Then you will have this for so many different recipes. Barbeque, broil, or grill to taste! YUMMMMY!!!!!"
ins: Whisk together the fish sauce, rice wine, sesame oil, sugar, garlic, ginger, and honey in a small bowl. Marinate meat at least 6 hours or over night before cooking.
